thread.title: Supply & Demand Chain Executive Magazine Names Martin Verwijmeren a 2018 “Pro to Know”

author: cnbc.com
title: Supply & Demand Chain Executive Magazine Names Martin Verwijmeren a 2018 “Pro to Know”
text:
BOSTON, Feb. 27, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- MP Objects , a leading global provider of enterprise supply chain orchestration software, today announced that Supply & Demand Chain Executive , the executive's user manual for successful supply and demand chain transformation, has named CEO and founder, Martin Verwijmeren, a “Pro to Know” in their 17th annual listing of the 2018 “Pros to Know” in the supply chain industry.
This year’s “Pros to Know” list includes more than 200 individuals from software firms and service providers, consultancies or academia, who helped their supply chain clients, or the supply chain community at large prepare to meet these challenges.
“ Supply & Demand Chain Executive congratulates the 2018 Supply & Demand Chain Executive ‘Pros to Know’ recipients. The ‘Pros to Know’ is a listing of exceptional corporate executives at manufacturing and non-manufacturing enterprises who are leading initiatives to help prepare their companies’ supply chains for the significant challenges in the year ahead,” says John Yuva, editor of Supply & Demand Chain Executive . “We commend this year’s recipients for their achievements in supply chain and for paving the way for the next generation of exceptional supply chain leaders. This year’s recipients embody the commitment to transformative supply chain tools and processes, earning these individuals a rightful place in this year’s ‘Pros to Know’ listing.”
“We’re thrilled that Supply & Demand Chain Executive has recognized Martin's unique vision and by proxy, the supply chain orchestration platform we’ve created that’s helping our global customers achieve visibility and control over all of the parties in their supply chains,” said Paul van Dongen, CTO and co-founder of MP Objects.
Check out Supply & Demand Chain Executive ’s website at www.sdcexec.com for the full list of all of the 2018 “Pros to Know” and “Practitioner Pros” winners.
About MP Objects
With offices in Rotterdam, Boston, Hyderabad, and Tokyo, MP Objects (MPO) helps some of the world’s largest logistics service providers and brand owners embrace the increasing complexity of their business-critical supply chains. The MPO Platform for Supply Chain Orchestration unifies fragmented information, processes and services from siloed ERP, WMS, and TMS systems, helping you to master perfect inbound, outbound and reverse order flows, and giving you visibility, collaboration and optimization across all of the internal and external parties in your supply chain. For more information, please visit mp-objects.com .
About Supply & Demand Chain Executive
Supply & Demand Chain Executive is the executive's user manual for successful supply and demand chain transformation, utilizing hard-hitting analysis, viewpoints and unbiased case studies to steer executives and supply management professionals through the complicated, yet critical, world of supply and demand chain enablement to gain competitive advantage. Visit us on the web at www.SDCExec.com .
